column1: Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions. Success doesn’t just find you. You have to go out and get it. Performance DevOps Machine Learning Python Agile Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication. Zero Downtime Deployment Data Pipeline Event-driven Architecture API Backend Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
OAuth Container Orchestration Pull Request Success is not in what you have
column2: but who you are. Content Delivery Network Python Success is how high you bounce when you hit bottom.
